member.name: T:Jda.WfmEssApi.Common.ISingleResourceApiQuery
member.summary: Used to signify to the ProtocolEnforcer that only a single "resource" (a thing with a URI of its own) should be fetched. Must be a read-only operation (in API Contract terms). member.name: T:Jda.WfmEssApi.MyGoodFaithEstimateApi.MyGoodFaithEstimateController
member.summary: This is to get applicable good faith estimate for an employee, Site Manager must provide new employees with a good faith estimate of the schedules they are likely to work from Hire Date to no. of days recommended by the respective law. This feature would Help the Site Manager to stay compliant and reduce the risk of penalties.
